page.title: 16DARTMOUTH FUTURE PROJECTS(3)
page.content: A{swimming pool project}has been considered since the late 19th century.The swimming pool fund stands at{Â£12,000}this year (1985), but Â£60,000 is needed for a basic open air {heated}pool. Land has been made available by{Devon {County Council}at the Community College at Milton lane. The County Council together with South Hams District Council,the Sports Council, and other organizations will also be putting forward the rest of the money. The pool will be a standard size,{(8m by 25m). The pool will be used by the{school and the{community.}It is envisaged that a roof will be put on later. Any profits made will be used to provide equipment for the school.
